nodes.text: Vago Gejalli Thokka was a Hutt crime lord. Although born into the Gejalli kajidic, Vago was adopted into the Anjiliac clan by Popara with the eradication of her blood-clan's holdings.

Never fully trusted by the Anjiliac Hutts, Vago was used as an intermediary because of her ability to speak Basic. After the death of her adoptive parent, Vago coordinated the eradication of Popara's assassin, Mika and became the newest Kajidii of the Anjiliac clan.
